ComicInfo.Title: Chapter Sixteen: Hunter's Moon; In Search Of Wild Journeys
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-19 15:22:19. [CVDB24718] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-10 23:15:42. [Issue ID 39124]

ComicInfo.Summary:
Chapter Sixteen: Hunter's Moon: There is a strange fog, the Native Americans discuss war, and the inhabitants of Fort Miami experience an eclipse.
In Search Of Wild Journeys: A frontiersman goes in search of issues of Journey
